creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: single panel; wide multicolored striped section at outer edges approx. 3 5/8" wide; two sections approx 3 3/4" wide; each red background with animal and floral motifs and wide multicolored stripes at center; slightly gathered section at top
title: Tzute
